resources.string: Allows Lazilock lite to turn off your screen when appropriate triggers occurs.
You pocket it, we lock it.
Give Lazilock access to your lock.
Device Admin disabled, you may now uninstall this app as per normal.
Your device is unsupported. Thanks for your interest though.

Step 1. Be lazy. 

Step 2. Put phone in pocket. 

Step 3. Know that it's locked and smile =) 

Step 4. Show off to the next person you meet. 

Step 5. checkout Lazilock Pro, where there are cool features like LaziMute which mutes incoming calls. 


I would appreciate your ratings/comments!=) 

 *** Tell me if you have any creative ways to be lazy! ***
Checkout Lazilock Pro, where there are cool features like LaziMute which mutes incoming calls.
